title: Update release-branch insertion release definition to do XSD updates
body:
We should consider updating the locked-down-for-release release definition https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_release?_a=releases&view=mine&definitionId=2153 to consume the script now published by #5531.

We can't do this until after 16.7 RTM since 16.7 doesn't have that change.

One note: we shouldn't be changing the XSD late in release, because the whole reason it's still in VS is that it's localized there, and "late in release" is also "past the loc deadline". So this should be pretty low pri.
